alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Northwestern Nye County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 24 at 5:24PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Icy roads expected across much of central Nevada... Additional wet snowfall and refreezing of liquid water will lead to icy road conditions tonight through Saturday morning across northern and central Nevada. Use caution while traveling as the roads can be hazardous from ice. Ice may not always be obvious and could be just a thin layer known as black ice. This can occur on bridges and overpasses even while the rest of the road does not have ice. Additional snow is expected to stay mainly north of I-80 through Saturday morning. Motorists and holiday travelers should remain alert to rapidly changing weather, and take necessary precautions if travel is necessary. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
